   21: %%
   22: -module(mnesia_durability_test).
   23: -author('hakan@erix.ericsson.se').
   24: 
   25: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   26:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   27:          all/0, groups/0]).
   28: 
   29: -export([durability_of_disc_copies/1,
   30:          durability_of_disc_only_copies/1,
   31:          load_latest_data/1, load_local_contents_directly/1,
   32:          load_directly_when_all_are_ram_copiesA/1,
   33:          load_directly_when_all_are_ram_copiesB/1,
   34:          load_when_last_replica_becomes_available/1,
   35:          load_when_down_from_all_other_replica_nodes/1,
   36:          late_load_transforms_into_disc_load/1,
   37:          late_load_leads_to_hanging/1,
   38:          force_load_when_nobody_intents_to_load/1,
   39:          force_load_when_someone_has_decided_to_load/1,
   40:          force_load_when_someone_else_has_loaded/1,
   41:          force_load_when_we_has_loaded/1,
   42:          force_load_on_a_non_local_table/1,
   43:          force_load_when_the_table_does_not_exist/1,
   44:          late_load_all_ram_cs_ram_nodes1/1,
   45:          late_load_all_ram_cs_ram_nodes2/1,
   46:          master_nodes/1, starting_master_nodes/1,
   47:          master_on_non_local_tables/1,
   48:          remote_force_load_with_local_master_node/1,
   49:          master_node_with_ram_copy_2/1, master_node_with_ram_copy_3/1,
   50:          dump_ram_copies/1, dump_disc_copies/1, dump_disc_only/1]).
   51: 
   52: -include("mnesia_test_lib.hrl").
   53: 
   54: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   55: 
   56: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   57:     mnesia_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   58: 
   59: end_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   60:     mnesia_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   61: 
   62: -record(test_rec,{key,val}).
   63: 
   64: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   65: 
   66: all() -> 
   67:     [{group, load_tables},
   68:      {group, durability_of_dump_tables},
   69:      durability_of_disc_copies,
   70:      durability_of_disc_only_copies].
   71: 
   72: groups() -> 
   73:     [{load_tables, [],
   74:       [load_latest_data, load_local_contents_directly,
   75:        load_directly_when_all_are_ram_copiesA,
   76:        load_directly_when_all_are_ram_copiesB,
   77:        {group, late_load_when_all_are_ram_copies_on_ram_nodes},
   78:        load_when_last_replica_becomes_available,
   79:        load_when_down_from_all_other_replica_nodes,
   80:        late_load_transforms_into_disc_load,
   81:        late_load_leads_to_hanging,
   82:        force_load_when_nobody_intents_to_load,
   83:        force_load_when_someone_has_decided_to_load,
   84:        force_load_when_someone_else_has_loaded,
   85:        force_load_when_we_has_loaded,
   86:        force_load_on_a_non_local_table,
   87:        force_load_when_the_table_does_not_exist,
   88:        {group, load_tables_with_master_tables}]},
   89:      {late_load_when_all_are_ram_copies_on_ram_nodes, [],
   90:       [late_load_all_ram_cs_ram_nodes1,
   91:        late_load_all_ram_cs_ram_nodes2]},
   92:      {load_tables_with_master_tables, [],
   93:       [master_nodes, starting_master_nodes,
   94:        master_on_non_local_tables,
   95:        remote_force_load_with_local_master_node,
   96:        master_node_with_ram_copy_2, master_node_with_ram_copy_3]},
   97:      {durability_of_dump_tables, [],
   98:       [dump_ram_copies, dump_disc_copies, dump_disc_only]}].
   99: 
  100: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  101:     Config.
  102: 
  103: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  104:     Config.
  105: 
  106: 
  107: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  108: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  109: 
  110: load_latest_data(doc) ->
  111:     ["Base functionality, verify that the latest data is loaded"];
  112: load_latest_data(suite) -> [];
  113: load_latest_data(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  114:     [N1,N2,N3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  115:     %%Create a replicated local table
  116:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(t0, [{disc_copies,[N1,N2]}])),
  117:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(t1, [{disc_copies,[N1,N2]}])),
  118:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(t2, [{disc_copies,[N1,N2]}])),
  119:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(t3, [{disc_copies,[N1,N2]}])),
  120:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(t4, [{disc_copies,[N1,N2]}])),
  121:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(t5, [{disc_copies,[N1,N2]}])),
  122:     Rec1 = {t1, test, ok},
  123:     Rec2 = {t1, test, 2},
  124: 
  125:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N1])),
  126:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_write, [Rec2])),
  127:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2])),
  128:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N3])),
  129:    
  130:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N1], [])),   
  131:     %% Should wait for N2
  132:     ?match({timeout, [t1]}, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[t1], 1000])),
  133:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N3], [])),   
  134:     ?match({timeout, [t1]}, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[t1], 1000])),
  135: 
  136: 
  137:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N2], [])),   
  138:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[t1], 10000])),
  139:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[t1], 10000])),
  140:     %% We should find the record
  141:     ?match([Rec2], rpc:call(N1, mnesia, dirty_read, [t1, test])),
  142:     ?match([Rec2], rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_read, [t1, test])),
  143:     
  144:     %% ok, lets switch order    
  145:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete_object(Rec1)),
  146:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete_object(Rec2)),
  147:     %% redo
  148: 
  149:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2])),
  150:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Rec1)),
  151:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N3])),
  152:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N1])),
  153: 
  154:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N2], [])),   
  155:     %% Should wait for N1
  156:     ?match({timeout, [t1]}, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[t1], 1000])),
  157:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N3], [])),   
  158:     ?match({timeout, [t1]}, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[t1], 1000])),
  159:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N1], [])),
  160:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[t1], 10000])),
  161:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[t1], 10000])),
  162:     %% We should find the record
  163:     ?match([Rec1], rpc:call(N1, mnesia, dirty_read, [t1, test])),
  164:     ?match([Rec1], rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_read, [t1, test])),
  165:     
  166:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  167: 
  168: 
  169: load_local_contents_directly(doc) ->
  170:     ["Local contents shall always be loaded. Check this by having a local ",
  171:      "table on two nodes N1, N2, stopping N1 before N2, an then verifying ",
  172:      "that N1 can start without N2 being started."];
  173: load_local_contents_directly(suite) -> [];
  174: load_local_contents_directly(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  175:     [N1, N2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  176:     %%Create a replicated local table
  177:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  178:            mnesia:create_table(test_rec,
  179:                                [{local_content,true},
  180:                                 {disc_copies,Nodes},
  181:                                 {attributes,record_info(fields,test_rec)}]
  182:                               ) ),
  183:     %%Verify that it has local contents.
  184:     ?match( true, mnesia:table_info(test_rec,local_content) ),
  185:     %%Helper Funs
  186:     Write_one = fun(Value) -> mnesia:write(#test_rec{key=1,val=Value}) end,
  187:     Read_one  = fun(Key)   -> mnesia:read( {test_rec, Key}) end,
  188:     %%Write a value one N1 that we may test against later
  189:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  190:            rpc:call( N1, mnesia, transaction, [Write_one,[11]] ) ),
  191:     %%Stop Mnesia on N1
  192:     %?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([N1])),
  193:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N1])),
  194: 
  195:     %%Write a value on N2, same key but a different value
  196:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  197:            rpc:call( N2, mnesia, transaction, [Write_one,[22]] ) ),
  198:     %%Stop Mnesia on N2
  199:     %?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([N2])),
  200:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2])),
  201: 
  202:     %%Restart Mnesia on N1 verify that we can read from it without
  203:     %%starting Mnesia on N2.
  204:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, start, [])),
  205:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[test_rec], 30000])),
  206:     %%Read back the value
  207:     ?match( {atomic,[#test_rec{key=1,val=11}]},
  208:            rpc:call(N1, mnesia, transaction, [Read_one,[1]] ) ),
  209:     %%Restart Mnesia on N2 and verify the contents there.
  210:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [])),
  211:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[test_rec], 30000])),
  212:     ?match( {atomic,[#test_rec{key=1,val=22}]},
  213:            rpc:call(N2, mnesia, transaction, [Read_one,[1]] ) ),
  214:     %%Check that the start of Mnesai on N2 did not affect the contents on N1
  215:     ?match( {atomic,[#test_rec{key=1,val=11}]},
  216:            rpc:call(N1, mnesia, transaction, [Read_one,[1]] ) ),
  217:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  218: 
  219: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  220: 
  221: load_directly_when_all_are_ram_copiesA(doc) ->
  222:     ["Tables that are RAM copies only shall also be loaded directly. ",
  223:      "1. N1 and N2 has RAM copies of a table, stop N1 before N2. ",
  224:      "2. When N1 starts he shall have access to the table ",
  225:      "   without having to start N2" ];
  226: load_directly_when_all_are_ram_copiesA(suite) -> [];
  227: load_directly_when_all_are_ram_copiesA(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  228:     [N1, N2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  229:     
  230:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  231:            mnesia:create_table(test_rec,
  232:                                [{ram_copies,Nodes},
  233:                                 {attributes,record_info(fields,test_rec)}]
  234:                               ) ),
  235:     ?match( Nodes, mnesia:table_info(test_rec,ram_copies) ),
  236:     ?match( [], mnesia:table_info(test_rec,disc_copies) ),
  237:     ?match( [], mnesia:table_info(test_rec,disc_only_copies) ),
  238:     Write_one = fun(Value) -> mnesia:write(#test_rec{key=2,val=Value}) end,
  239:     Read_one  = fun()      -> mnesia:read({test_rec,2}) end,
  240:     %%Write a value one N1 that we may test against later
  241:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  242:            rpc:call( N1, mnesia, transaction, [Write_one,[11]] ) ),
  243:     %%Stop Mnesia on N1
  244:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N1])),
  245:     %%Write a value and check result (on N2; not possible on N1
  246:     %%since Mnesia is stopped there).
  247:     ?match({atomic,ok}, rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[22]]) ),
  248:     ?match({atomic,[#test_rec{key=2,val=22}]},
  249:            rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one]) ),
  250:     %%Stop Mnesia on N2
  251:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2])),
  252:     %%Restart Mnesia on N1 verify that we can access test_rec from
  253:     %%N1 without starting Mnesia on N2.
  254:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, start, [])),
  255:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[test_rec], 30000])),
  256:     ?match({atomic,[]}, rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one])),
  257:     ?match({atomic,ok}, rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[33]])),
  258:     ?match({atomic,[#test_rec{key=2,val=33}]},
  259:            rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one])),
  260:     %%Restart Mnesia on N2 and verify the contents there.
  261:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N2], [test_rec])),
  262:     ?match( {atomic,[#test_rec{key=2,val=33}]},
  263:            rpc:call(N2, mnesia, transaction, [Read_one] ) ),
  264:     %%Check that the start of Mnesai on N2 did not affect the contents on N1
  265:     ?match( {atomic,[#test_rec{key=2,val=33}]},
  266:            rpc:call(N1, mnesia, transaction, [Read_one] ) ),
  267:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  268: 
  269: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  270: 
  271: load_directly_when_all_are_ram_copiesB(doc) ->
  272:     ["Tables that are RAM copies only shall be loaded from a replicat ",
  273:      "when possible. ",
  274:      "1. N1 and N2 has RAM copies of a table, stop N1 before N2.",
  275:      "2. Now start N2 first and then N1, N1 shall then load the table ",
  276:      "   from N2."];
  277: load_directly_when_all_are_ram_copiesB(suite) -> [];
  278: load_directly_when_all_are_ram_copiesB(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  279:     [N1, N2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  280:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  281:            mnesia:create_table(test_rec,
  282:                                [{ram_copies,Nodes},
  283:                                 {attributes,record_info(fields,test_rec)}]
  284:                               ) ),
  285:     ?match( Nodes, mnesia:table_info(test_rec,ram_copies) ),
  286:     ?match( [], mnesia:table_info(test_rec,disc_copies) ),
  287:     ?match( [], mnesia:table_info(test_rec,disc_only_copies) ),
  288:     Write_one = fun(Value) -> mnesia:write(#test_rec{key=3,val=Value}) end,
  289:     Read_one  = fun()      -> mnesia:read( {test_rec, 3}) end,
  290:     %%Write a value one N1 that we may test against later
  291:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  292:            rpc:call( N1, mnesia, transaction, [Write_one,[11]] ) ),
  293:     ?match({atomic,[#test_rec{key=3,val=11}]},
  294:            rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one]) ),
  295:     %%Stop Mnesia on N1
  296:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N1])),
  297:     %%Write a value and check result (on N2; not possible on N1
  298:     %%since Mnesia is stopped there).
  299:     ?match({atomic,ok}, rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[22]]) ),
  300:     ?match({atomic,[#test_rec{key=3,val=22}]},
  301:            rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one]) ),
  302:     %%Stop Mnesia on N2
  303:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2])),
  304:     %%Restart Mnesia on N2 verify that we can access test_rec from
  305:     %%N2 without starting Mnesia on N1.
  306:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [])),
  307:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[test_rec], 30000])),
  308:     ?match({atomic,[]}, rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one])),
  309:     ?match({atomic,ok}, rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[33]])),
  310:     ?match({atomic,[#test_rec{key=3,val=33}]},
  311:            rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one])),
  312:     %%Restart Mnesia on N1 and verify the contents there.
  313:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N1], [test_rec])),
  314:     ?match( {atomic,[#test_rec{key=3,val=33}]},
  315:            rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one])),
  316:     %%Check that the start of Mnesai on N1 did not affect the contents on N2
  317:     ?match( {atomic,[#test_rec{key=3,val=33}]},
  318:            rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one])),
  319:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  320: 
  321: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  322: 
  323: 
  324: late_load_all_ram_cs_ram_nodes1(suite) -> [];
  325: late_load_all_ram_cs_ram_nodes1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  326:     [N1, N2] = mnesia_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{init_test_case, [mnesia]},
  327: 						  delete_schema,
  328: 						  {reload_appls, [mnesia]}],
  329: 						 2, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE),
  330:     Res = late_load_when_all_are_ram_copies_on_ram_nodes(N1, [N2], Config),
  331:     mnesia_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{reload_appls, [mnesia]}],
  332: 				      2, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE),
  333:     Res.
  334: 
  335: late_load_all_ram_cs_ram_nodes2(suite) -> [];
  336: late_load_all_ram_cs_ram_nodes2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  337:     [N1, N2, N3] = mnesia_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{init_test_case, [mnesia]},
  338: 						      delete_schema,
  339: 						      {reload_appls, [mnesia]}],
  340: 						     3, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE),
  341:     Res = late_load_when_all_are_ram_copies_on_ram_nodes(N1, [N2, N3], Config),
  342:     mnesia_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{reload_appls, [mnesia]}],
  343: 				      3, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE),
  344:     Res.
  345: 
  346: late_load_when_all_are_ram_copies_on_ram_nodes(DiscNode, RamNs, _Config)
  347:         when DiscNode == node() ->
  348:     ?match(ok, mnesia:create_schema([DiscNode])),
  349:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start()),
  350:     Nodes = [DiscNode | RamNs],
  351:     Extra = [{extra_db_nodes, Nodes}],
  352:     Ok = [ok || _ <- RamNs],
  353:     ?match({Ok, []}, rpc:multicall(RamNs, mnesia, start, [Extra])),
  354:     ?match([], wait_until_running(Nodes)),
  355: 
  356:     LastRam = lists:last(RamNs),
  357:     %% ?match({atomic, ok},
  358:     %%	   mnesia:add_table_copy(schema, LastRam, ram_copies)),
  359:     Def = [{ram_copies, RamNs}, {attributes, record_info(fields, test_rec)}],
  360:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(test_rec, Def)),
  361:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []),
  362:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia(RamNs)),
  363:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
  364:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start()),
  365: 
  366:     Rec1 = #test_rec{key=3, val=33},
  367:     Rec2 = #test_rec{key=4, val=44},
  368:     
  369:     FirstRam = hd(RamNs),
  370:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(FirstRam, mnesia, start, [Extra])),
  371:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(FirstRam, mnesia, wait_for_tables,
  372: 			[[test_rec], 30000])),
  373:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(FirstRam, mnesia, dirty_write,[Rec1])),
  374:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([test_rec], 30000)),
  375:     mnesia:dirty_write(Rec2),
  376: 
  377:     if
  378: 	FirstRam /= LastRam ->
  379: 	    ?match(ok, rpc:call(LastRam, mnesia, start, [Extra])),
  380: 	    ?match(ok, rpc:call(LastRam, mnesia, wait_for_tables,
  381: 				[[test_rec], 30000]));
  382: 	true ->
  383: 	    ignore
  384:     end,
  385:     ?match([Rec1], rpc:call(LastRam, mnesia, dirty_read, [{test_rec, 3}])),
  386:     ?match([Rec2], rpc:call(LastRam, mnesia, dirty_read, [{test_rec, 4}])),
  387:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  388: 
  389: wait_until_running(Nodes) ->
  390:     wait_until_running(Nodes, 30).
  391: 
  392: wait_until_running(Nodes, Times) when Times > 0->
  393:     Alive = mnesia:system_info(running_db_nodes),
  394:     case Nodes -- Alive of
  395: 	[] ->
  396: 	    [];
  397: 	Remaining ->
  398: 	    timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
  399: 	    wait_until_running(Remaining, Times - 1)
  400:     end;
  401: wait_until_running(Nodes, _) ->
  402:     Nodes.
  403: 
  404: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  405: load_when_last_replica_becomes_available(doc) ->
  406:     ["Check that when all Mnesia nodes die at the same instant, then the ",
  407:      "replicated table shall be accessible when the last node is started ",
  408:      "again.",
  409:      "Checked by cheating. Start Mnesia on N1, N2, N3. Have a table ",
  410:      "replicated on disc on all three nodes, fill in some transactions, ",
  411:      "install a fallback. Restart mnesia on all nodes"
  412:      "This is the cheat and it simulates that all nodes died at the same ",
  413:      "time. Check that the table is only accessible after the last node ",
  414:      "has come up."];
  415: load_when_last_replica_becomes_available(suite) -> [];
  416: load_when_last_replica_becomes_available(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  417:     [N1, N2, N3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  418:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  419:            mnesia:create_table(test_rec,
  420:                                [{disc_copies,Nodes},
  421:                                 {attributes,record_info(fields,test_rec)}]
  422:                               ) ),
  423:     ?match( [], mnesia:table_info(test_rec,ram_copies) ),
  424:     ?match( Nodes, mnesia:table_info(test_rec,disc_copies) ),
  425:     ?match( [], mnesia:table_info(test_rec,disc_only_copies) ),
  426:     Write_one = fun(Key,Val)->mnesia:write(#test_rec{key=Key,val=Val}) end,
  427:     Read_one  = fun(Key)    ->mnesia:read( {test_rec, Key}) end,
  428:     %%Write one value from each node.
  429:     ?match({atomic,ok},rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[1,11]])),
  430:     ?match({atomic,ok},rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[2,22]])),
  431:     ?match({atomic,ok},rpc:call(N3,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[3,33]])),
  432:     %%Check the values
  433:     ?match({atomic,[#test_rec{key=1,val=11}]},
  434:            rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[1]]) ),
  435:     ?match({atomic,[#test_rec{key=2,val=22}]},
  436:            rpc:call(N3,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[2]]) ),
  437:     ?match({atomic,[#test_rec{key=3,val=33}]},
  438:            rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[3]]) ),
  439:     
  440:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup("test_last_replica")),
  441:     ?match(ok, mnesia:install_fallback("test_last_replica")),
  442:     file:delete("test_last_replica"),
  443:     %%Stop Mnesia on all three nodes   
  444:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes)),
  445: 
  446:     %%Start Mnesia on one node, make sure that test_rec is not available
  447:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [])),
  448:     ?match({timeout,[test_rec]},
  449:            rpc:call(N2, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[test_rec], 10000])),
  450:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, start, [])),
  451:     ?match({timeout,[test_rec]},
  452:            rpc:call(N1, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[test_rec], 10000])),
  453:     %%Start the third node
  454:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, start, [])),
  455:     %%Make sure that the table is loaded everywhere
  456:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[test_rec], 30000])),
  457:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[test_rec], 30000])),
  458:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[test_rec], 30000])),
  459: 
  460:     %%Check the values
  461:     ?match({atomic,[#test_rec{key=1,val=11}]},
  462:            rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[1]]) ),
  463:     ?match({atomic,[#test_rec{key=2,val=22}]},
  464:            rpc:call(N3,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[2]]) ),
  465:     ?match({atomic,[#test_rec{key=3,val=33}]},
  466:            rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[3]]) ),
  467:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  468: 
  469: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  470: 
  471: load_when_down_from_all_other_replica_nodes(doc) ->
  472:     ["The table can be loaded if this node was the last one surviving. ",
  473:      "Check this by having N1, N2, N3 and a table replicated on all those ",
  474:      "nodes. Then kill them in the N1, N2, N3 order. Then start N3 and ",
  475:      "verify that the table is available with correct contents."];
  476: load_when_down_from_all_other_replica_nodes(suite) -> [];
  477: load_when_down_from_all_other_replica_nodes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  478:     [N1, N2, N3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  479:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  480:            mnesia:create_table(test_rec,
  481:                                [{disc_copies,Nodes},
  482:                                 {attributes,record_info(fields,test_rec)}]
  483:                               ) ),
  484:     ?match( [], mnesia:table_info(test_rec,ram_copies) ),
  485:     ?match( Nodes, mnesia:table_info(test_rec,disc_copies) ),
  486:     ?match( [], mnesia:table_info(test_rec,disc_only_copies) ),
  487:     Write_one = fun(Key,Val)->mnesia:write(#test_rec{key=Key,val=Val}) end,
  488:     Read_one  = fun(Key)    ->mnesia:read( {test_rec, Key}) end,
  489:     %%Write one value from each node.
  490:     ?match({atomic,ok},rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[1,111]])),
  491:     ?match({atomic,ok},rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[2,222]])),
  492:     ?match({atomic,ok},rpc:call(N3,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[3,333]])),
  493:     %%Check the values
  494:     ?match({atomic,[#test_rec{key=1,val=111}]},
  495:            rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[1]]) ),
  496:     ?match({atomic,[#test_rec{key=2,val=222}]},
  497:            rpc:call(N3,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[2]]) ),
  498:     ?match({atomic,[#test_rec{key=3,val=333}]},
  499:            rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[3]]) ),
  500:     %%Stop Mnesia on all three nodes
  501:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N1])),
  502:     ?match({atomic,ok},rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[22,22]])),
  503:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2])),
  504:     ?match({atomic,ok},rpc:call(N3,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[33,33]])),
  505:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N3])),
  506:     ?verbose("Mnesia stopped on all three nodes.~n",[]),
  507: 
  508:     %%Start Mnesia on N3; wait for 'test_rec' table to load
  509:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, start, [])),
  510:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[test_rec], 30000])),
  511: 
  512:     %%Check the values
  513:     ?match({atomic,[#test_rec{key=1,val=111}]},
  514:            rpc:call(N3,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[1]]) ),
  515:     ?match({atomic,[#test_rec{key=2,val=222}]},
  516:            rpc:call(N3,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[2]]) ),
  517:     ?match({atomic,[#test_rec{key=3,val=333}]},
  518:            rpc:call(N3,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[3]]) ),
  519:     ?match({atomic,[#test_rec{key=22,val=22}]},
  520:            rpc:call(N3,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[22]]) ),
  521:     ?match({atomic,[#test_rec{key=33,val=33}]},
  522:            rpc:call(N3,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[33]]) ),
  523:     ?verify_mnesia([N3], [N1, N2]).
  524: 
  525: 
  526: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  527: 
  528: late_load_transforms_into_disc_load(doc) ->
  529:     ["Difficult case that needs instrumentation of Mnesia.",
  530:      "A table is force loaded, and Mnesia decides to load it from another ",
  531:      "Mnesia node because it is available there. The other Mnesia node then ",
  532:      "dies in mid copy which shall make the first Mnesia node to really ",
  533:      "force load from disc.",
  534:      "Check this by starting N1 and N2 and replicating a table between ",
  535:      "them. Then kill N1 before N2. The idea is to start N2 first, then ",
  536:      "N1 and then do a force load on N1. This force load will load from ",
  537:      "N2 BUT N2 must be killed after the decision to load from it has ",
  538:      "been made. tricky."];
  539: 
  540: late_load_transforms_into_disc_load(suite) ->  [];
  541: late_load_transforms_into_disc_load(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  542:     ?is_debug_compiled,
  543:     
  544:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  545:     
  546:     {success, [A, B]} = ?start_activities(Nodes),
  547:     
  548:     ?match(Node1, node(A)),
  549:     ?match(Node2, node(B)),
  550: 
  551:     Tab = late_load_table,
  552:     Def = [{attributes, [key, value]},
  553:            {disc_copies, Nodes}],  
  554:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
  555:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 111, 4711})),
  556:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 222, 42})),
  557: 
  558:     TestPid = self(),
  559:     DebugId = {mnesia_loader, do_get_network_copy},
  560:     DebugFun = fun(PrevContext, EvalContext) ->
  561: 		       ?verbose("interrupt late load,  pid ~p  #~p ~n context ~p ~n",
  562: 			    [self(),PrevContext,EvalContext]),
  563: 		       
  564: 		       mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node2]),
  565: 		       TestPid ! {self(),debug_fun_was_called},
  566: 
  567: 		       ?verbose("interrupt late_log - continues ~n",[]),
  568: 		       ?deactivate_debug_fun(DebugId),
  569: 		       PrevContext+1
  570: 	       end,
  571:     ?remote_activate_debug_fun(Node1,DebugId, DebugFun, 1),
  572:     
  573:     %% kill mnesia on node1
  574:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node1]),    
  575:     %% wait a while, so  that mnesia is really down 
  576:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)), 
  577: 
  578:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab, 222, 815}])),
  579: 
  580:     %% start Mnesia on node1
  581:     ?match(ok,mnesia:start()),
  582:     ?match(yes, mnesia:force_load_table(Tab)),
  583:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([Tab],timer:seconds(30))),
  584:     
  585:     receive_messages([debug_fun_was_called]),
  586:     
  587:     check_tables([A],[{Tab,111},{Tab,222}],[[{Tab,111,4711}],[{Tab,222,42}]]),
  588:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], [Node2]).
  589: 
  590: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  591: 
  592: late_load_leads_to_hanging(doc) ->
  593:     ["Difficult case that needs instrumentation of Mnesia.",
  594:      "A table is loaded, and Mnesia decides to load it from another ",
  595:      "Mnesia node because it has the latest copy there. ",
  596:      "The other Mnesia node then ",
  597:      "dies in mid copy which shall make the first Mnesia node not to ",
  598:      "force load from disc but to wait for the other node to come up again",
  599:      "Check this by starting N1 and N2 and replicating a table between ",
  600:      "them. Then kill N1 before N2. The idea is to start N2 first, then ",
  601:      "N1. This load will load from ",
  602:      "N2 BUT N2 must be killed after the decision to load from it has ",
  603:      "been made. tricky."];
  604: 
  605: late_load_leads_to_hanging(suite) ->  [];
  606: late_load_leads_to_hanging(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  607:     ?is_debug_compiled,
  608: 
  609:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  610:     
  611:     Tab = late_load_table,
  612:     Def = [{attributes, [key, value]},
  613:            {disc_copies, Nodes}],  
  614: 
  615:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
  616:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 111, 4711})),
  617:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 222, 42})),
  618: 
  619:     DebugId = {mnesia_loader, do_get_network_copy},
  620:     DebugFun = fun(PrevContext, EvalContext) ->
  621: 		       ?verbose("interrupt late load,  pid ~p  #~p ~n context ~p ~n",
  622: 			    [self(), PrevContext, EvalContext]),
  623: 		       mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node2]),
  624: 		       ?verbose("interrupt late load - continues ~n",[]),
  625: 		       ?deactivate_debug_fun(DebugId),
  626: 		       PrevContext+1
  627: 	       end,
  628: 
  629:     ?remote_activate_debug_fun(Node1,DebugId, DebugFun, 1),
  630:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node1]),
  631:     %% wait a while, so  that mnesia is really down 
  632:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)), 
  633:     
  634:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab, 333, 666}])),
  635:     
  636:     %% start Mnesia on node1
  637:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start()),
  638: 
  639:     ?match({timeout, [Tab]}, mnesia:wait_for_tables([Tab], timer:seconds(2))),
  640: 
  641:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, _}}, mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, 222})),    
  642:     %% mnesia on node1 is waiting for node2 coming up 
  643:     
  644:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, start, [])),
  645:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([Tab], timer:seconds(30))),
  646:     ?match([{Tab, 333, 666}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, 333})),   
  647:     ?verify_mnesia([Node2, Node1], []).
  648: 
  649: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  650: 
  651: force_load_when_nobody_intents_to_load(doc) ->
  652:     ["Normal force load. Start N1 N2, kill in N1, N2 order. Start N1 do ",
  653:      "force load. Did it work?"];
  654: force_load_when_nobody_intents_to_load(suite) -> [];
  655: force_load_when_nobody_intents_to_load(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  656:     [N1, N2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  657:     Table = test_rec,
  658:     Trec1a = #test_rec{key=1,val=111},
  659:     Trec1b = #test_rec{key=1,val=333},
  660:     Trec2a = #test_rec{key=2,val=222},
  661:     Trec3a = #test_rec{key=3,val=333},
  662:     Trec3b = #test_rec{key=3,val=666},
  663: 
  664:     ?match({atomic,ok}, rpc:call(N1, mnesia,create_table,
  665:                                  [Table,
  666:                                   [{disc_copies,Nodes},
  667:                                    {attributes,record_info(fields,test_rec)}
  668:                                   ] ] ) ),
  669:     ?match( [], mnesia:table_info(Table,ram_copies) ),
  670:     ?match( Nodes, mnesia:table_info(Table,disc_copies) ),
  671:     ?match( [], mnesia:table_info(Table,disc_only_copies) ),
  672:     Write_one = fun(Rec) -> mnesia:write(Rec) end,
  673:     Read_one  = fun(Key) -> mnesia:read({Table, Key}) end,
  674:     %%Write one value
  675:     ?match({atomic,ok},rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[Trec1a]])),
  676:     %%Check it
  677:     ?match({atomic,[Trec1a]},rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[1]]) ),
  678:     %%Shut down mnesia on N1
  679:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([N1])),
  680:     %%Write and check value while N1 is down
  681:     ?match({atomic,ok},rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[Trec1b]])),
  682:     ?match({atomic,ok},rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[Trec2a]])),
  683:     ?match({atomic,ok},rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[Trec3a]])),
  684:     ?match({aborted,{node_not_running,N1}},
  685:            rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[2]]) ),
  686:     ?match({atomic,[Trec1b]},rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[1]]) ),
  687:     ?match({atomic,[Trec2a]},rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[2]]) ),
  688:     ?match({atomic,[Trec3a]},rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[3]]) ),
  689:     %%Shut down Mnesia on N2
  690:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([N2])),
  691: 
  692:     %%Restart Mnesia on N1
  693:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, start, [])),
  694:     %%Check that table is not available (waiting for N2)
  695:     ?match({timeout,[Table]},
  696:            rpc:call(N1, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Table], 3000])),
  697: 
  698:     %%Force load on N1
  699:     ?match(yes,rpc:call(N1,mnesia,force_load_table,[Table])),
  700:     %%Check values
  701:     ?match({atomic,[Trec1a]},rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[1]]) ),
  702:     ?match({atomic,[]},     rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[2]]) ),
  703:     ?match({atomic,[]},     rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[3]]) ),
  704:     %%Write a value for key=3
  705:     ?match({atomic,ok},rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[Trec3b]])),
  706: 
  707:     %%Restart N2 and check values
  708:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [])),
  709:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Table], 30000])),
  710: 
  711:     ?match({atomic,[Trec1a]},rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[1]]) ),
  712:     ?match({atomic,[Trec1a]},rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[1]]) ),
  713: 
  714:     ?match({atomic,[]},rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[2]]) ),
  715:     ?match({atomic,[]},rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[2]]) ),
  716: 
  717:     ?match({atomic,[Trec3b]},rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[3]]) ),
  718:     ?match({atomic,[Trec3b]},rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[3]]) ),
  719:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  720: 
  721: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  722: 
  723: force_load_when_someone_has_decided_to_load(doc) ->
  724:     ["Difficult case that needs instrumentation of Mnesia.",
  725:      "Start N1 and N2, replicate table, kill in N1, N2 order. Start N2 ",
  726:      "and start N1 before N2 has really loaded the table but after N2 has ",
  727:      "decided to load it."];
  728: 
  729: force_load_when_someone_has_decided_to_load(suite) -> [];
  730: force_load_when_someone_has_decided_to_load(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  731:     ?is_debug_compiled,
  732:     
  733:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),   
  734:     {success, [A, B]} = ?start_activities(Nodes),        
  735:     ?match(Node1, node(A)), %% Just to check :)
  736:     ?match(Node2, node(B)),
  737: 
  738:     Tab = late_load_table,
  739:     Def = [{attributes, [key, value]}, {disc_copies, Nodes}],  
  740: 
  741:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
  742:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 111, 4711})),
  743:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 222, 42})),
  744: 
  745:     Self = self(),
  746:     DebugId = {mnesia_controller, late_disc_load},
  747:     DebugFun = fun(PrevContext, EvalContext) ->
  748: 		       ?verbose("interrupt late disc load,
  749:                              pid ~p  #~p ~n context ~p ~n",
  750: 			    [self(),PrevContext,EvalContext]),
  751: 		       Self ! {self(), fun_in_postion},
  752: 		       wait_for_signal(),
  753: 		       ?verbose("interrupt late disc load - continues ~n",[]),
  754: 		       ?deactivate_debug_fun(DebugId),
  755: 		       PrevContext+1
  756: 	       end,
  757:  
  758:     %% kill mnesia on node1
  759:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node1]),
  760:     %% wait a while, so  that mnesia is really down 
  761:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)), 
  762: 
  763:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab, 222, 815}])),
  764:     %% kill mnesia on node2
  765:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node2]),
  766:     %% wait a while, so that mnesia is really down 
  767:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)), 
  768: 
  769:     ?remote_activate_debug_fun(Node2,DebugId, DebugFun, 1),
  770: 
  771:     B ! fun() -> mnesia:start() end,    
  772:     [{Mnesia_Pid, fun_in_postion}] = receive_messages([fun_in_postion]),    
  773:     
  774:     %% start Mnesia on node1
  775:     A ! fun() -> mnesia:start() end, 
  776:     ?match_receive(timeout),
  777: % Got some problem with this testcase when we modified mnesia init 
  778: % These test cases are very implementation dependent!
  779: %    A ! fun() -> mnesia:wait_for_tables([Tab], 3000) end,
  780: %    ?match_receive({A, {timeout, [Tab]}}),
  781:     A ! fun() -> mnesia:force_load_table(Tab) end,
  782:     ?match_receive(timeout),
  783: 
  784:     Mnesia_Pid ! continue,
  785:     ?match_receive({B, ok}),
  786:     ?match_receive({A, ok}),
  787:     ?match_receive({A, yes}),
  788: 
  789:     B ! fun() -> mnesia:wait_for_tables([Tab], 10000) end,
  790:     ?match_receive({B, ok}),
  791:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([Tab], timer:seconds(30))),
  792:     ?match([{Tab, 222, 815}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, 222})),
  793:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  794: 
  795: wait_for_signal() ->
  796:     receive 
  797: 	continue -> ok
  798:     %% Don't eat any other mnesia internal msg's
  799:     after 
  800: 	timer:minutes(2) -> ?error("Timedout in wait_for_signal~n", [])
  801:     end.
  802: 	
  803: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  804: 
  805: force_load_when_someone_else_has_loaded(doc) ->
  806:     ["Normal case. Do a force load when somebody else has loaded the table. ",
  807:      "Start N1, N2, kill in N1, N2 order. Start N2 load the table, start N1 ",
  808:      "force load. Did it work? (i.e: did N1 load the table from N2 as that",
  809:      "one is the latest version and it is available on N2)"];
  810: 
  811: force_load_when_someone_else_has_loaded(suite) -> [];
  812: force_load_when_someone_else_has_loaded(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  813:     [N1, N2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  814:     Table = test_rec,
  815:     Trec1 = #test_rec{key=1,val=111},
  816:     Trec2 = #test_rec{key=1,val=222},
  817: 
  818:     ?match({atomic,ok}, rpc:call(N1, mnesia,create_table,
  819:                                  [Table,
  820:                                   [{disc_copies,Nodes},
  821:                                    {attributes,record_info(fields,test_rec)}
  822:                                   ] ] ) ),
  823:     ?match( [], mnesia:table_info(Table,ram_copies) ),
  824:     ?match( Nodes, mnesia:table_info(Table,disc_copies) ),
  825:     ?match( [], mnesia:table_info(Table,disc_only_copies) ),
  826:     Write_one = fun(Rec) -> mnesia:write(Rec) end,
  827:     Read_one  = fun(Key) -> mnesia:read({Table, Key}) end,
  828:     %%Write one value
  829:     ?match({atomic,ok},rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[Trec1]])),
  830:     %%Check it
  831:     ?match({atomic,[Trec1]},rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[1]]) ),
  832:     %%Shut down mnesia
  833:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([N1])),
  834:     timer:sleep(500),
  835:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([N2])),
  836:     %%Restart Mnesia on N2;wait for tables to load
  837:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, start, [])),
  838:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[test_rec], 30000])),
  839:     %%Write one value
  840:     ?match({atomic,ok},rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[Trec2]])),
  841:     %%Start on N1; force load
  842:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia, start, [])),
  843:     %%Force load from file
  844:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(N1,mnesia,force_load_table,[Table])),
  845:     %%Check the value
  846:     ?match({atomic,[Trec2]},rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[1]]) ),
  847:        %%               === there must be a Trec2 here !!!!
  848:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  849: 
  850: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  851: 
  852: force_load_when_we_has_loaded(doc) ->
  853:     ["Force load a table we already have loaded"];
  854: force_load_when_we_has_loaded(suite) -> [];
  855: force_load_when_we_has_loaded(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  856:     [N1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  857:     Table = test_rec,
  858:     Trec1 = #test_rec{key=1,val=111},
  859:     Trec2 = #test_rec{key=1,val=222},
  860: 
  861:     ?match({atomic,ok}, rpc:call(N1, mnesia,create_table,
  862:                                  [Table,
  863:                                   [{disc_copies,Nodes},
  864:                                    {attributes,record_info(fields,test_rec)}
  865:                                   ] ] ) ),
  866:     ?match( [], mnesia:table_info(Table,ram_copies) ),
  867:     ?match( Nodes, mnesia:table_info(Table,disc_copies) ),
  868:     ?match( [], mnesia:table_info(Table,disc_only_copies) ),
  869:     Write_one = fun(Rec) -> mnesia:write(Rec) end,
  870:     Read_one  = fun(Key) -> mnesia:read({Table, Key}) end,
  871:     %%Write one value
  872:     ?match({atomic,ok},rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[Trec1]])),
  873:     %%Check it
  874:     ?match({atomic,[Trec1]},rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[1]]) ),
  875:     %%Shut down mnesia
  876:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia(Nodes)),
  877:     %%Restart Mnesia;wait for tables to load
  878:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes, [Table])),
  879:     %%Write one value
  880:     ?match({atomic,ok},rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[Trec2]])),
  881:     %%Force load from file
  882:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(N1,mnesia,force_load_table,[Table])),
  883:     %%Check the value
  884:     ?match({atomic,[Trec2]},rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[1]]) ),
  885:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  886: 
  887: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  888: 
  889: force_load_on_a_non_local_table(doc) ->
  890:     ["This is NOT allowed, the test case is a negative test",
  891:      "Force load on a table that isn't replicated on this node."];
  892: force_load_on_a_non_local_table(suite) -> [];
  893: force_load_on_a_non_local_table(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  894:     [N1, N2, N3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes( 3, Config),
  895:     TableNodes = lists:sublist(Nodes,2),
  896:     Table = test_rec,
  897:     Trec1 = #test_rec{key=1,val=11},
  898: 
  899:     ?match({atomic,ok}, rpc:call(N1, mnesia,create_table,
  900:                                  [Table,
  901:                                   [{disc_copies,TableNodes},
  902:                                    {attributes,record_info(fields,test_rec)}
  903:                                   ] ] ) ),
  904:     ?match( [], mnesia:table_info(Table,ram_copies) ),
  905:     ?match( TableNodes, mnesia:table_info(Table,disc_copies) ),
  906:     ?match( [], mnesia:table_info(Table,disc_only_copies) ),
  907:     Write_one = fun(Rec) -> mnesia:write(Rec) end,
  908:     Read_one  = fun(Key) -> mnesia:read({Table, Key}) end,
  909:     %%Write one value
  910:     ?match({atomic,ok},rpc:call(N1,mnesia,transaction,[Write_one,[Trec1]])),
  911:     %%Check it from the other nodes
  912:     ?match({atomic,[Trec1]},rpc:call(N2,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[1]]) ),
  913:     ?match({atomic,[Trec1]},rpc:call(N3,mnesia,transaction,[Read_one,[1]]) ),
  914: 
  915:     %%Make sure that Table is non-local
  916:     ?match_inverse(N3, rpc:call(N3,mnesia,table_info,[Table,where_to_read])),
  917:     %%Try to force load it
  918:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(N3,mnesia,force_load_table,[Table])),
  919:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  920: 
  921: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  922: 
  923: force_load_when_the_table_does_not_exist(doc) ->
  924:     ["This is NOT allowed, the test case is a negative test",
  925:      "Force load on a table that doesn't exist."];
  926: force_load_when_the_table_does_not_exist(suite) -> [];
  927: force_load_when_the_table_does_not_exist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  928:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes( 2, Config),
  929:     
  930:     %%Dummy table
  931:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  932:            mnesia:create_table(test_rec,
  933:                                [{disc_copies,Nodes},
  934:                                 {attributes,record_info(fields,test_rec)}]
  935:                               ) ),
  936:     ?match( [], mnesia:table_info(test_rec,ram_copies) ),
  937:     ?match( Nodes, mnesia:table_info(test_rec,disc_copies) ),
  938:     ?match( [], mnesia:table_info(test_rec,disc_only_copies) ),
  939:     Tab = dummy,
  940:     %%Make sure that Tab is an unknown table
  941:     ?match( false, lists:member(Tab,mnesia:system_info(tables)) ),
  942:     ?match( {error, {no_exists, Tab}}, mnesia:force_load_table(Tab) ),
  943:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  944: 
  945: 
  946: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  947: 
  948: 
  949: 
  950: -define(SDwrite(Tup), fun() -> mnesia:write(Tup) end).			            
  951: 
  952: master_nodes(suite) -> [];
  953: master_nodes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  954:     [A, B, C] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  955:     Tab = test_table_master_nodes,    
  956:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, [{disc_copies, Nodes}])),
  957: 
  958:     %% Test one: Master A and the table should be loaded from A
  959: 
  960:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, set_master_nodes, [Tab, [A]])),
  961:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:sync_transaction(?SDwrite({Tab, 1, init}))),
  962:     
  963:     mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([A]),
  964:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(B, mnesia, sync_transaction, [?SDwrite({Tab, 1, updated})])),
  965:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, start, [])),
  966:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 3000])),
  967:     
  968:     ?match([{Tab, 1, init}], rpc:call(A, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
  969:     ?match([{Tab, 1, updated}], rpc:call(B, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
  970:     ?match([{Tab, 1, updated}], rpc:call(C, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
  971:     
  972:     %% Test 2: Master [A,B] and B is Up the table should be loaded from B
  973: 
  974:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, set_master_nodes, [Tab, [A, B]])),
  975:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:sync_transaction(?SDwrite({Tab, 1, init}))),
  976:     
  977:     mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([A]),
  978:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(B, mnesia, sync_transaction, [?SDwrite({Tab, 1, updated})])),
  979:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, start, [])),
  980:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 3000])),
  981:     
  982:     ?match([{Tab, 1, updated}], rpc:call(A, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
  983:     ?match([{Tab, 1, updated}], rpc:call(B, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
  984:     ?match([{Tab, 1, updated}], rpc:call(C, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
  985: 
  986:     %% Test 3: Master [A,B] and B is down the table should be loaded from A
  987: 
  988:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, set_master_nodes, [Tab, [A, B]])),
  989:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:sync_transaction(?SDwrite({Tab, 1, init}))),
  990:     
  991:     mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([A]),
  992:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(B, mnesia, sync_transaction, [?SDwrite({Tab, 1, updated})])),
  993:     mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([B]),
  994:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, start, [])),
  995:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 3000])),
  996:     
  997:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, start, [])),
  998:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 3000])),
  999:     
 1000:     ?match([{Tab, 1, init}], rpc:call(A, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1001:     ?match([{Tab, 1, _Unknown}], rpc:call(B, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1002:     ?match([{Tab, 1, updated}], rpc:call(C, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1003:     
 1004:     %% Test 4: Master [B] and B is Up the table should be loaded from B
 1005: 
 1006:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, set_master_nodes, [Tab, [B]])),
 1007:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:sync_transaction(?SDwrite({Tab, 1, init}))),
 1008:     
 1009:     mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([A]),
 1010:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(B, mnesia, sync_transaction, [?SDwrite({Tab, 1, updated})])),
 1011:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, start, [])),
 1012:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 3000])),
 1013:     
 1014:     ?match([{Tab, 1, updated}], rpc:call(A, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1015:     ?match([{Tab, 1, updated}], rpc:call(B, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1016:     ?match([{Tab, 1, updated}], rpc:call(C, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1017:     
 1018:     %% Test 5: Master [B] and B is down the table should not be loaded
 1019: 
 1020:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, set_master_nodes, [Tab, [B]])),
 1021:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:sync_transaction(?SDwrite({Tab, 1, init}))),
 1022:     
 1023:     mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([A]),
 1024:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(B, mnesia, sync_transaction, [?SDwrite({Tab, 1, updated})])),
 1025:     mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([B]),
 1026:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(C, mnesia, sync_transaction, [?SDwrite({Tab, 1, update_2})])),
 1027:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, start, [])),
 1028:     ?match({timeout, [Tab]}, rpc:call(A, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 2000])),
 1029: 
 1030:     %% Test 6: Force load on table that couldn't be loaded due to master 
 1031:     %%         table settings, loads other active replicas i.e. from C
 1032: 
 1033:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(A, mnesia, force_load_table, [Tab])),
 1034:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 3000])),
 1035:     
 1036:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, start, [])),
 1037:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 3000])),
 1038:     
 1039:     ?match([{Tab, 1, update_2}], rpc:call(A, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1040:     ?match([{Tab, 1, update_2}], rpc:call(B, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1041:     ?match([{Tab, 1, update_2}], rpc:call(C, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1042: 
 1043:     %% Test 7: Master [B] and B is down the table should not be loaded, 
 1044:     %%         force_load when there are no active replicas available 
 1045:     %%         should generate a load of a local table
 1046: 
 1047:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, set_master_nodes, [Tab, [B]])),
 1048:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:sync_transaction(?SDwrite({Tab, 1, init}))),
 1049:     
 1050:     mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([A]),
 1051:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(B, mnesia, sync_transaction, [?SDwrite({Tab, 1, updated})])),
 1052:     mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([B, C]),
 1053:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, start, [])),
 1054:     ?match({timeout, [Tab]}, rpc:call(A, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 2000])),
 1055: 
 1056:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(A, mnesia, force_load_table, [Tab])),
 1057:     ?match([{Tab, 1, init}], rpc:call(A, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1058: 
 1059:     ?verify_mnesia([A], [B,C]).
 1060: 
 1061: starting_master_nodes(suite) -> [];
 1062: starting_master_nodes(doc) -> 
 1063:     ["Complementory to TEST 5 and 6 above, if the master node (B) starts"
 1064:      " and loads the table it should be loaded on the waiting node (A) "];
 1065: starting_master_nodes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1066:     [A, B, C] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1067:     Tab = starting_master_nodes,    
 1068:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, [{disc_copies, Nodes}])),
 1069:     %% Start by checking TEST 5 above.
 1070:     
 1071:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, set_master_nodes, [Tab, [B]])),
 1072:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:sync_transaction(?SDwrite({Tab, 1, init}))),
 1073:     mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([A]),
 1074:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(B, mnesia, sync_transaction, [?SDwrite({Tab, 1, updated})])),
 1075:     mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([B]),
 1076:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(C, mnesia, sync_transaction, [?SDwrite({Tab, 1, update_2})])),
 1077:     
 1078:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, start, [])),
 1079:     ?match({timeout, [Tab]}, rpc:call(A, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 2000])),
 1080:     %% Start the B node and the table should be loaded on A!
 1081:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, start, [])),
 1082:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 3000])),
 1083:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 3000])),
 1084:     
 1085:     ?verify_mnesia([A,B,C], []).
 1086: 
 1087: 
 1088: master_on_non_local_tables(suite) -> [];
 1089: master_on_non_local_tables(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1090:     [A, B, C] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1091:     Tab = test_table_non_local,    
 1092:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, [{disc_copies, [B, C]}])),
 1093: 
 1094:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, set_master_nodes, [Tab, [B]])),
 1095:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:sync_transaction(?SDwrite({Tab, 1, init}))),
 1096: 
 1097:     %% Test 1: Test that table info are updated when master node comes up
 1098:     
 1099:     mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([A, B]),
 1100:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(C, mnesia, sync_transaction, [?SDwrite({Tab, 1, updated})])),   
 1101:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, start, [])),
 1102:     
 1103:     ?match({timeout, [Tab]}, rpc:call(A, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 2000])),
 1104:     ErrorRead = {badrpc,{'EXIT', {aborted,{no_exists,[test_table_non_local,1]}}}},
 1105:     ErrorWrite = {badrpc,{'EXIT', {aborted,{no_exists,test_table_non_local}}}},
 1106:     ?match(ErrorRead, rpc:call(A, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1107:     ?match(ErrorWrite, rpc:call(A, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab, 1, updated_twice}])),
 1108:     
 1109:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, start, [])),
 1110:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 2000])),
 1111:     
 1112:     ?match([{Tab, 1, updated}], rpc:call(A, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1113:     ?match(B, rpc:call(A, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, where_to_read])),
 1114:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(A, mnesia, sync_transaction, [?SDwrite({Tab, 1, init})])),
 1115: 
 1116:     %% Test 2: Test that table info are updated after force_load
 1117: 
 1118:     mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([A, B]),
 1119:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(C, mnesia, sync_transaction, [?SDwrite({Tab, 1, updated})])),   
 1120:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, start, [])),
 1121:     
 1122:     ?match({timeout, [Tab]}, rpc:call(A, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 2000])),
 1123:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(A, mnesia, force_load_table, [Tab])),
 1124:     ?match(C, rpc:call(A, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, where_to_read])),
 1125: 
 1126:     ?match([{Tab, 1, updated}], rpc:call(A, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1127:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(A, mnesia, sync_transaction, [?SDwrite({Tab, 1, updated_twice})])),
 1128:     
 1129:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, start, [])),
 1130:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 10000])),
 1131: 
 1132:     ?match([{Tab, 1, updated_twice}], rpc:call(A, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1133:     ?match([{Tab, 1, updated_twice}], rpc:call(B, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1134:     ?match([{Tab, 1, updated_twice}], rpc:call(C, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1135:     
 1136:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1137: 
 1138: remote_force_load_with_local_master_node(doc) ->
 1139:     ["Force load a table on a remote node while the ",
 1140:      "local node is down. Start the local node and ",
 1141:      "verify that the tables is loaded from disc locally "
 1142:      "if the local node has itself as master node and ",
 1143:      "the remote node has both the local and remote node ",
 1144:      "as master nodes"];
 1145: remote_force_load_with_local_master_node(suite) -> [];
 1146: remote_force_load_with_local_master_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1147:     [A, B] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1148: 
 1149:     Tab = remote_force_load_with_local_master_node,
 1150:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, [{disc_copies, Nodes}])),
 1151:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, set_master_nodes, [Tab, [A, B]])),
 1152:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, set_master_nodes, [Tab, [B]])),
 1153:     
 1154:     W = fun(Who) -> mnesia:write({Tab, who, Who}) end,
 1155:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(A,mnesia, sync_transaction, [W, [a]])),
 1156:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(A, mnesia, stop, [])),
 1157:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(B, mnesia, sync_transaction, [W, [b]])),
 1158:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(B, mnesia, stop, [])),
 1159: 
 1160:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, start, [])),
 1161:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 3000])),
 1162:     ?match([{Tab, who, a}], rpc:call(A, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, who}])),
 1163:     
 1164:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, start, [])),
 1165:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 3000])),
 1166:     ?match([{Tab, who, b}], rpc:call(B, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, who}])),
 1167: 
 1168:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1169: 
 1170: master_node_with_ram_copy_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1171:     [A, B] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1172:     Tab = ?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1173:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, [{disc_copies, [A]}, {ram_copies, [B]}])),
 1174:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:sync_transaction(?SDwrite({Tab, 1, init}))),
 1175: 
 1176:     %% Test that we don't load from ram_copies
 1177:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(A, mnesia, stop, [])),
 1178:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(B, mnesia, stop, [])),
 1179:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, start, [])),
 1180:     ?match({timeout, [Tab]}, rpc:call(B, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 1000])),
 1181:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, start, [])),
 1182:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 3000])),
 1183:     ?match([{Tab, 1, init}], rpc:call(A, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1184:     ?match([{Tab, 1, init}], rpc:call(B, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1185: 
 1186:     %% Test that master_nodes set to ram_copy node require force_load
 1187:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, set_master_nodes, [[B]])),
 1188:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(A, mnesia, stop, [])),
 1189:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(B, mnesia, stop, [])),
 1190:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, start, [])),
 1191:     ?match({timeout, [Tab]}, rpc:call(B, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 1000])),
 1192:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, start, [])),
 1193:     ?match({timeout, [Tab]}, rpc:call(B, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 1000])),
 1194: 
 1195:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(A, mnesia, force_load_table, [Tab])),
 1196:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 1000])),
 1197:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 1000])),
 1198:     ?match([{Tab, 1, init}], rpc:call(A, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1199:     ?match([{Tab, 1, init}], rpc:call(B, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1200: 
 1201:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1202: 
 1203: 
 1204: master_node_with_ram_copy_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1205:     [A, B, C] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1206:     Tab = ?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1207:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, [{disc_copies, [A,C]}, {ram_copies, [B]}])),
 1208:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:sync_transaction(?SDwrite({Tab, 1, init}))),
 1209: 
 1210:     %% Test that we don't load from ram_copies
 1211:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(A, mnesia, stop, [])),
 1212:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(C, mnesia, stop, [])),
 1213:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(B, mnesia, stop, [])),
 1214:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, start, [])),
 1215:     ?match({timeout, [Tab]}, rpc:call(B, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 1000])),
 1216:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, start, [])),
 1217:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(C, mnesia, start, [])),
 1218:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 3000])),
 1219:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 3000])),
 1220:     ?match([{Tab, 1, init}], rpc:call(A, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1221:     ?match([{Tab, 1, init}], rpc:call(B, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1222:     ?match([{Tab, 1, init}], rpc:call(C, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1223: 
 1224:     %% Test that master_nodes set to ram_copy node will wait until loaded
 1225:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, set_master_nodes, [[B]])),
 1226:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(A, mnesia, stop, [])),
 1227:     ?match({atomic,ok}, rpc:call(B, mnesia, sync_transaction, [?SDwrite({Tab, 1, update})])),
 1228:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(C, mnesia, stop, [])),
 1229:     ?match({atomic,ok}, rpc:call(B, mnesia, sync_transaction, [?SDwrite({Tab, 1, ram_copies})])),
 1230:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(B, mnesia, stop, [])),
 1231:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, start, [])),
 1232:     ?match({timeout, [Tab]}, rpc:call(B, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 500])),
 1233:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, start, [])),
 1234:     ?match({timeout, [Tab]}, rpc:call(A, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 500])),
 1235:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(C, mnesia, start, [])),
 1236:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 3000])),
 1237:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 3000])),
 1238:     ?match([{Tab, 1, update}], rpc:call(A, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1239:     ?match([{Tab, 1, update}], rpc:call(B, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1240:     ?match([{Tab, 1, update}], rpc:call(C, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1241: 
 1242:     %% Test that master_nodes set to ram_copy node requires force load
 1243:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:sync_transaction(?SDwrite({Tab, 1, init}))),
 1244:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, set_master_nodes, [[B]])),
 1245:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(C, mnesia, set_master_nodes, [[B]])),
 1246: 
 1247:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(A, mnesia, stop, [])),
 1248:     ?match({atomic,ok}, rpc:call(B, mnesia, sync_transaction, [?SDwrite({Tab, 1, update})])),
 1249:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(C, mnesia, stop, [])),
 1250:     ?match({atomic,ok}, rpc:call(B, mnesia, sync_transaction, [?SDwrite({Tab, 1, ram_copies})])),
 1251:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(B, mnesia, stop, [])),
 1252:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, start, [])),
 1253:     ?match({timeout, [Tab]}, rpc:call(B, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 500])),
 1254:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, start, [])),
 1255:     ?match({timeout, [Tab]}, rpc:call(A, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 500])),
 1256:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(C, mnesia, start, [])),
 1257:     ?match({timeout, [Tab]}, rpc:call(A, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 500])),
 1258:     ?match({timeout, [Tab]}, rpc:call(B, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 500])),
 1259:     ?match({timeout, [Tab]}, rpc:call(B, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 500])),
 1260:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(C, mnesia, force_load_table, [Tab])),
 1261: 
 1262:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(A, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 3000])),
 1263:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(B, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 3000])),
 1264:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(C, mnesia, wait_for_tables, [[Tab], 3000])),
 1265:     ?match([{Tab, 1, update}], rpc:call(A, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1266:     ?match([{Tab, 1, update}], rpc:call(B, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1267:     ?match([{Tab, 1, update}], rpc:call(C, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1268: 
 1269:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1270: 
 1271: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1272: 
 1273: 
 1274: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1275: 
 1276: dump_ram_copies(doc) -> 
 1277:     ["Check that ram_copies tables are loaded with the"
 1278:      "contents that had been dumped before Mnesia",
 1279:      "was restarted. " ];
 1280: dump_ram_copies(suite)  -> [];
 1281: dump_ram_copies(Config) when is_list(Config)  ->
 1282:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1283:     {success, [P1,P2,P3]} = ?start_activities(Nodes),
 1284:     
 1285:     NP1 = node(P1),
 1286:     NP2 = node(P2),
 1287:     
 1288:     {A,B,C} = case node() of
 1289: 		  NP1 ->
 1290: 						%?verbose("first case ~n"),
 1291: 		      {P3,P2,P1};
 1292: 		  NP2 ->
 1293: 						%?verbose("second case ~n"),
 1294: 		      {P3,P1,P2};
 1295: 		  _  ->
 1296: 		      {P1,P2,P3}
 1297: 	      end,
 1298:     
 1299:     Node1 = node(A),
 1300:     Node2 = node(B),
 1301:     Node3 = node(C),
 1302:     
 1303:     ?verbose(" A   pid:~p  node:~p ~n",[A,Node1]),
 1304:     ?verbose(" B   pid:~p  node:~p ~n",[B,Node2]),
 1305:     ?verbose(" C   pid:~p  node:~p ~n",[C,Node3]),
 1306:     
 1307:     
 1308:     %%  ram copies table on 2 nodes
 1309:     
 1310:     Tab = dump_table,
 1311:     Def = [{attributes, [key, value]},
 1312:            {ram_copies, [Node1,Node2]}],      
 1313:     
 1314:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
 1315:     
 1316:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, 4711})),
 1317:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 2, 42})),
 1318:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 3, 256})),
 1319:     
 1320:     %%  dump the table
 1321:     
 1322:     ?match( {atomic,ok}, mnesia:dump_tables([Tab])),
 1323:     
 1324:     %% perform updates (they shall be lost after kill Mnesia )
 1325:     
 1326:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, 815})),
 1327:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 2, 915})),
 1328:     
 1329:     %% add another replica on node3
 1330:     mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab,Node3,ram_copies),
 1331:     
 1332:     %% all 3 replicas shall have the new contents
 1333:     cross_check_tables([A,B,C],Tab,
 1334:                        {[{Tab,1,815}],[{Tab,2,915}],[{Tab,3,256}]}),
 1335:     
 1336:     %% kill mnesia on node 3
 1337:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node3]),
 1338:     
 1339:     %% wait a while, so  that mnesia is really down 
 1340:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(2)), 
 1341:     
 1342:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node1,Node2]),  %% kill them as well
 1343:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(2)), 
 1344:     
 1345:     %% start Mnesia only on node 3
 1346:     ?verbose("starting mnesia on Node3~n",[]),
 1347:     
 1348:     %% test_lib:mnesia_start doesn't work, because it waits
 1349:     %% for the schema on all nodes ... ???
 1350:     ?match(ok,rpc:call(Node3,mnesia,start,[]) ),
 1351:     ?match(ok,rpc:call(Node3,mnesia,wait_for_tables,
 1352: 		       [[Tab],timer:seconds(30)]   ) ),
 1353:     
 1354:     %% node3  shall have the contents of the dump
 1355:     cross_check_tables([C],Tab,{[{Tab,1,4711}],[{Tab,2,42}],[{Tab,3,256}]}),
 1356:     
 1357:     %% start Mnesia on the other 2 nodes, too
 1358:     mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node1,Node2],[Tab]),
 1359:     
 1360:     cross_check_tables([A,B,C],Tab,
 1361: 		       {[{Tab,1,4711}],[{Tab,2,42}],[{Tab,3,256}]}),
 1362:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1363: 
 1364: %% check the contents of the table
 1365: 
 1366: cross_check_tables([],_tab,_elements) -> ok;
 1367: cross_check_tables([Pid|Rest],Tab,{Val1,Val2,Val3}) ->
 1368:     Pid ! fun () ->
 1369:               R1 = mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,1}),
 1370:               R2 = mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,2}),
 1371:               R3 = mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,3}),
 1372:               {R1,R2,R3}
 1373:             end,
 1374:     ?match_receive({ Pid, {Val1, Val2, Val3 } }),
 1375:     cross_check_tables(Rest,Tab,{Val1,Val2,Val3} ).   
 1376: 
 1377: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1378: 
 1379: %% Should be in evil test suite !!!
 1380: 
 1381: dump_disc_copies(doc) -> 
 1382:       ["Check that it is not possible to dump disc_copies tables"];
 1383: dump_disc_copies(suite)  -> [];
 1384: dump_disc_copies(Config) when is_list(Config)  ->
 1385:     do_dump_copies(Config, disc_copies).
 1386: 
 1387: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1388: 
 1389: %% Should be in evil test suite !!!
 1390: dump_disc_only(doc) -> 
 1391:        ["Check that it is not possible to dump disc_only_copies tables"];
 1392: dump_disc_only(suite)  -> [];
 1393: dump_disc_only(Config) when is_list(Config)  ->
 1394:     do_dump_copies(Config,disc_only_copies).
 1395: 
 1396: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1397: do_dump_copies(Config,Copies) ->
 1398:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1399: 
 1400:     Tab = dump_copies,
 1401:     Def = [{attributes, [key, value]},
 1402:            {Copies, [Node1]}],      
 1403:     
 1404:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
 1405: 
 1406:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, 4711})),
 1407:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 2, 42})),
 1408:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 3, 256})),
 1409: 
 1410:     %%  dump the table
 1411:     ?match( {aborted, {"Only allowed on ram_copies",Tab,[Node1]}},
 1412:               mnesia:dump_tables([Tab])),
 1413: 
 1414:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, 815})),
 1415:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 2, 915})),
 1416: 
 1417:     %% kill mnesia on node1
 1418:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node1]),
 1419:     
 1420:     %% wait a while, so  that mnesia is really down 
 1421:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)), 
 1422: 
 1423:     mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node1],[Tab]),
 1424:     
 1425:     ?match([{Tab, 1, 815}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,1}) ),
 1426:     ?match([{Tab, 2, 915}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,2}) ),
 1427:     ?match([{Tab, 3, 256}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,3}) ),
 1428:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1429: 
 1430: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1431: durability_of_disc_copies(doc) -> 
 1432:        ["Perform all possible kinds of updates on tables and check"
 1433:         "whether no data is lost after a restart of Mnesia.",
 1434:         "This test is done for disc_copies"];
 1435: 
 1436: durability_of_disc_copies(suite) -> [];
 1437: durability_of_disc_copies(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1438:        do_disc_durability(Config,disc_copies).
 1439: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1440: 
 1441: durability_of_disc_only_copies(doc) -> 
 1442:        ["Perform all possible kinds of updates on tables and check"
 1443:         "whether no data is lost after a restart of Mnesia.",
 1444:         "This test is done for disc_only_copies"];
 1445: durability_of_disc_only_copies(suite) -> [];
 1446: durability_of_disc_only_copies(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1447:        do_disc_durability(Config,disc_only_copies).
 1448: 
 1449: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1450: 
 1451: do_disc_durability(Config,CopyType) ->
 1452:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config ++ [{tc_timeout, timer:minutes(1)}]),
 1453:     {success, [A,B,C]} = ?start_activities(Nodes),
 1454: 
 1455:     Tab_set = disc_durability_set,
 1456:     Def_set = [{attributes, [key, value]},
 1457: 	       {CopyType, Nodes}],  
 1458: 
 1459:     Tab_bag = disc_durability_bag,
 1460:     Def_bag = [{attributes, [key, value]},
 1461:                {type, bag},
 1462:                {CopyType, Nodes}],  
 1463: 
 1464:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab_set, Def_set)),
 1465:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab_bag, Def_bag)),
 1466: 
 1467:     %% do updates     
 1468:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 1469: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun()->
 1470: 				      mnesia:write({Tab_set, 11, 1111}),
 1471: 				      mnesia:write({Tab_set, 22, 2222}),
 1472: 				      mnesia:write({Tab_set, 33, 3333}),
 1473: 				      mnesia:write({Tab_set, 55, 5555})
 1474: 			      end)),
 1475:     mnesia:dirty_write({Tab_set, 44, 4444}),
 1476: 
 1477:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 1478: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun()->
 1479: 				      mnesia:write({Tab_bag, 11, a_1111}),
 1480: 				      mnesia:write({Tab_bag, 11, b_1111}),
 1481: 				      mnesia:write({Tab_bag, 22, a_2222}),
 1482: 				      mnesia:write({Tab_bag, 22, b_2222}),
 1483: 				      mnesia:write({Tab_bag, 33, a_3333}),
 1484: 				      mnesia:write({Tab_bag, 33, b_3333})
 1485: 			      end)),  
 1486:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 1487: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun()-> mnesia:delete({Tab_set, 22}) end)),  
 1488:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete({Tab_set, 33})),
 1489:     ?match(5558, mnesia:dirty_update_counter({Tab_set, 55}, 3)),
 1490:     ?match({atomic, ok}, 
 1491: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun()->
 1492: 				      mnesia:delete_object({Tab_bag, 22, b_2222})
 1493: 			      end)),  
 1494:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete_object({Tab_bag, 33, b_3333})),
 1495:     ?match(10, mnesia:dirty_update_counter({Tab_set, counter}, 10)),
 1496:     ?match({atomic, ok},  % Also syncs update_counter
 1497: 	   mnesia:sync_transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab_set,66,6666}) end)),  
 1498:     
 1499:     Updated = {[[{Tab_set,counter,10}],
 1500: 		[{Tab_set,counter,10}],
 1501: 		[{Tab_set,counter,10}]],[]},
 1502:     ?match(Updated, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, dirty_read, [Tab_set,counter])),
 1503:     
 1504:     %%  kill mnesia on all nodes, start it again and check the data
 1505:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia(Nodes),
 1506:     mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes,[Tab_set,Tab_bag]),
 1507:     
 1508:     ?log("Flushed ~p ~n", [mnesia_test_lib:flush()]), %% Debugging strange msgs..
 1509:     ?log("Processes ~p ~p ~p~n", [A,B,C]),
 1510:     check_tables([A,B,C], 
 1511: 		 [{Tab_set,11}, {Tab_set,22},{Tab_set,33},
 1512: 		  {Tab_set,44},{Tab_set,55}, {Tab_set,66},
 1513: 		  {Tab_bag,11}, {Tab_bag,22},{Tab_bag,33},
 1514: 		  {Tab_set, counter}],
 1515: 		 [[{Tab_set, 11, 1111}], [], [], [{Tab_set, 44, 4444}],
 1516: 		  [{Tab_set, 55, 5558}], [{Tab_set, 66, 6666}],
 1517: 		  lists:sort([{Tab_bag, 11, a_1111},{Tab_bag, 11, b_1111}]),
 1518: 		  [{Tab_bag, 22, a_2222}], [{Tab_bag, 33, a_3333}],
 1519: 		  [{Tab_set, counter, 10}]]),
 1520: 
 1521:     timer:sleep(500), %% Debugging strange msgs..
 1522:     ?log("Flushed ~p ~n", [mnesia_test_lib:flush()]),
 1523:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1524: 
 1525: %% check the contents of the table
 1526: %%
 1527: %%  all the processes in the PidList shall find all 
 1528: %%  table entries in ValList
 1529: 
 1530: check_tables([],_vallist,_resultList) -> ok;
 1531: check_tables([Pid|Rest],ValList,ResultList) ->
 1532:     Pid ! fun () ->
 1533:               check_values(ValList)
 1534:             end,
 1535:     ?match_receive({ Pid, ResultList }),
 1536:     check_tables(Rest,ValList,ResultList).
 1537: 
 1538: check_values([]) -> [];
 1539: check_values([{Tab,Key}|Rest]) ->
 1540:         Ret = lists:sort(mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,Key})),
 1541:         [Ret|check_values(Rest)].
 1542: 
 1543: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1544: %
 1545: %  stolen from mnesia_recovery_test.erl:
 1546: 
 1547: receive_messages([]) -> [];
 1548: receive_messages(ListOfMsgs) ->
 1549:     receive 
 1550:         timeout ->     
 1551:             case lists:member(timeout, ListOfMsgs) of
 1552:                 false -> 
 1553:                     ?warning("I (~p) have received unexpected msg~n ~p ~n",
 1554:                         [self(),timeout]),
 1555:                     receive_messages(ListOfMsgs);
 1556:                 true -> 
 1557:                     ?verbose("I (~p) got msg ~p  ~n", [self(),timeout]),
 1558:                     [ timeout | receive_messages(ListOfMsgs -- [timeout])]
 1559:             end;
 1560: 
 1561:         {Pid, Msg} ->     
 1562:             case lists:member(Msg, ListOfMsgs) of
 1563:                 false -> 
 1564:                     ?warning("I (~p) have received unexpected msg~n ~p ~n",
 1565:                         [self(),{Pid, Msg}]),
 1566:                     receive_messages(ListOfMsgs);
 1567:                 true -> 
 1568:                     ?verbose("I (~p) got msg ~p from ~p ~n", [self(),Msg, Pid]),
 1569:                     [{Pid, Msg} | receive_messages(ListOfMsgs -- [Msg])]
 1570:             end;
 1571: 
 1572:         Else -> ?warning("Received unexpected Msg~n ~p ~n", [Else])
 1573:     after timer:seconds(40) -> 
 1574:             ?error("Timeout in receive msgs while waiting for ~p~n", 
 1575:                    [ListOfMsgs])
 1576:     end.  
 1577:
